item.title: HSC Seminar
item.description:
Fall 2023

  • 10/4/23 - Data-centric Architecture Support for Security, Yuanchao Xu (UCSC)

  • 10/18/23 - Challenges and Opportunities to Accelerate ML Inference with Sparsity, Zhibin Xiao (Moffett.AI)

  • 11/1/23 - Reflections on Trusting TrustHUB, Christian Krieg (TU Wien)

  • 11/8/23 - EMISSARY: Enhanced Miss Awareness Replacement Policy for L2 Instruction Caching, Nayana Nagendra (Arm)

  • 11/15/23 - Opportunities and Challenges for In- and Near-Memory Computing for Machine Intelligence, Siddharth Joshi (Notre Dame), @s14joshi

Spring 2023

  • 4/12/23 - Scaling up Server Performance via In-Memory Processing, José Martínez (Cornell)

item.title: Publications
item.description:
2023

  • Lin Cheng, Max Ruttenberg, Dai Cheol Jung, Dustin Richmond, Michael B. Taylor, Mark Oskin, Christopher Batten, Beyond Static Parallel Loops: Supporting Dynamic Task Parallelism on Manycore Architectures with Software-Managed Scratchpad Memories. ASPLOS (3), 46-58, 2023.

  • Yikai Yang, Jason K. Eshraghian, Nhan Duy Truong, Armin Nikpour, Omid Kavehei, Neuromorphic deep spiking neural networks for seizure detection. Neuromorph. Comput. Eng. 3(1), 14010, 2023.

  • Juan Lu, Mohammed Bennamoun, Jonathon Stewart, Jason Kamran Eshraghian, Yanbin Liu, Benjamin J. W. Chow, Frank M. Sanfilippo, Girish Dwivedi, Multitask Deep Learning for Accurate Risk Stratification and Prediction of Next Steps for Coronary CT Angiography Patients. CoRR abs/2309.00330, 2023.
